ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Don t sell 8pp max i ve been sellin em for 10 pp So i can Get more money out of it and they sell pretty fast:-) The Wanderer P.s. The lower you make your
ygData.messageBody:
Well Don't sell 8pp max i've been sellin em for 10 pp
So i can Get more money out of it and they sell pretty
fast:-)
The Wanderer
P.s. The lower you make your prices the lower everyone
else expects someone else's
--- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> I set a hot button to say "Jaded Silver Ring, +5
> MANA, 8PP or best
> offer!" I hit the button each time I enter a zone.
> Sometimes I carry
> 1 extra with me, but I usually just sell the ones
> I'm wearing and go
> back to the bank to get a new one (or make a new
> one) form myself. If
> you are desperate for cash up front, sell the rings
> in your own guild's
> vendors and you'll make a few GP profit over the
> price of the
> components. I think Jade is the first item that is
> profitable to
> produce for vendors, less failures of course.
>
> Q d'E
>
> --- "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...> wrote:
> > From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>
> >
> > Well I don't know where you get 20p for a Jade
> ring.
> > I've been trying to
> > sell Jade Rings in Freeport at 8p each for 2 days
> > now (4 hours play
> > time). I have NOT sold one damn ring and I have 10
> > to sell. I'm not
> > going to waste anymore time trying to sell. I'm
> > going to sell to a
> > vendor, because I can make more money killing
> MOB's
> > in 4 hours then
> > trying to sell rings.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Wanderer CommonWealth
> > [mailto:wanderercw@...]
> > Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 5:59 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
> >
> >
> > From: Wanderer CommonWealth <wanderercw@...>
> >
> > Hello Enchanters of Norrath
> > Just to tell you that Jade rings sell for 20 plat
> > each
> > I sell em faster at 16-15 plat so Let's not make
> our
> > prices too cheap, Because if we do that than
> people
> > will expect even cheaper and well that's how
> normal
> > expensive things get so cheap. From my studies The
> > +5
> > mana is mana Regeneration, I mean my +2 mana robe
> > can't just add 2 mana and when i wear it i notice
> a
> > diffrence over time especially with the two +5
> mana
> > rings. So Don't sell at cost or anything unless
> it's
> > a
> > really good friend or a guild member.
> > I wan't to protect our economy (And our money)
> > Especially those in innoruk which i am on
> > I am Explorer There
> > The Wanderer
> > *May The Wanderer's Show you the way*
> >
> > --- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > >
> > > Jewelcraft is not broken. You can get up to
> skill
> > > 40 with jade before
> > > it becomes trivial. Perhaps it went up and you
> > > didn't notice? Maybe
> > > you just need to make some more. :)
> > >
> > > The going rate for Jaded Silver rings sold to
> PCs
> > is
> > > 8P, don't
> > > undersell them or you'll ruin the business for
> all
> > > of us. Sometimes I
> > > give a 1P discount to people who buy 2. And
> > selling
> > > to your friends is
> > > an all together different story anyway.
> > >
> > > It cost me probably 50 P to get to skill 40.,
> > > that's 50 P earned from
> > > monsters, not including sell back money. I've
> had
> > > some serious bad
> > > luck streaks. lots of failures with jade and
> > pearl.
> > >
> > > Q d'E
> > >
> >
>
